name: Slime Duty
description:
The game was developed around the theme,  "Out of space"  where the aim of the game is to eliminate the slimes before they destroy to many solar panels and shrink the forcefield that protects you.

Controls are "W,A,S,D" to move, "Space" to jump and "E" to repair

All content was created and gathered at the start of the MegaJam.
